attributes.action: allow British Forces posted abroad free or capped cheap calls back to the UK...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a scandal that companies are making huge profits out of HM Forces serving in conflicts abroad. I propose either free calls or capped to maximum of 15p per minute. No profits should be made. It is vital in the interests of morale of those away from home especially at this time of year.
